document_data.caption: A map showing Tayaraan at the mouth of the Kadan River.
document_data.name: Tayaraan
document_data.mainbody: '''Tayaraan''' was a small village found within the [[Cities of the Ancients]] region of [[east Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography: Tayaraan sat at the mouth of the [[Kadan River]] where it emptied into the western edge of [[Bahr al-Ajami]], making it quite an isolated settlement. The nearest major city was [[Rog'osto]] to the south. Though it was located roughly in the middle of the Ruined Kingdoms, Tayaraan was the easternmost occupied settlement as of 1367 DR. To the east stretched a vast expanse of dense jungle and ruins.
